summary.span: 实现文本控件要求的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by text controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现文本操作控件的核心功能，例如 和 。This class implements the core features of text manipulation controls, such as and . 其中包括文本选择、**剪贴板**功能、多行文本控件支持和多个事件。These include text selection, **Clipboard** functionality, multiline text control support, and many events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 创建具有垂直滚动条的多行 控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用 、和 属性，使多行文本框控件对于创建文本文档很有用。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行文本框控件中按 Tab 键时，是否在控件中键入一个 Tab 字符，而不是按选项卡的顺序将焦点移动到下一个控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the TAB key in a multiline text box control types a TAB character in the control instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.

value.span: 如果用户可以使用 Tab 键在多行文本框控件中输入 Tab 字符，则为 ；如果按 Tab 键移动焦点，则为 。

span.span: if users can enter tabs in a multiline text box using the TAB key; if pressing the TAB key moves the focus.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还必须 `true` 属性以获取控件中的制表符。The property must also be `true` to get a TAB character in the control. 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则用户必须按 CTRL + TAB 将焦点按 tab 键顺序移到下一个控件。If the property is set to `true`, the user must press CTRL+TAB to move the focus to the next control in the tab order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 创建具有垂直滚动条的多行 控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用 、和 属性，使多行文本框控件对于创建文本文档很有用。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法将文本添加到控件中的现有文本，而不是使用串联运算符（+）将文本连接到 属性。You can use this method to add text to the existing text in the control instead of using the concatenation operator (+) to concatenate text to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法和 属性将文本从一种 复制到另一种。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to copy text from one to another. 此示例要求已将两个名为、`textBox1` 和 `textBox2`的 控件添加到窗体，并且 `textBox1` 具有分配给其 属性的文本。This example requires that two controls named, `textBox1` and `textBox2`, have been added to a form and that `textBox1` has text assigned to its property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当更改分配给控件的字体时，是否自动调整控件的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font assigned to the control is changed.

value.span: 如果在更改字体时自动调整控件的高度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font is changed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `true` 用于 ，则在 更改时， 将展开或收缩 以容纳更大或更小的文本。When you set the property to `true` for a , when the changes, the expands or contracts the to accommodate the larger or smaller text. 的 不会发生更改。The of the does not change. 如果要在用户输入文本时更改控件的大小，则可以使用 控件并使用其 事件更改其大小。If you want to change the size of the control as the user enters text, you can use a control and use its event to change its size. ## Examples 此示例假设你有一个窗体，其中包含两个文本框，两个按钮，然后单击每个按钮的 "事件"。This example assumes that you have a form with two text boxes, two buttons, and click events for each of the buttons. 该示例通过将其设置为 `true` 一个文本框并为另一个文本框 `false`，来演示 属性。The example demonstrates the property by setting it to `true` for one text box and `false` for the other. 单击一个按钮时，文本框将用较小的文本进行填充，单击另一个按钮时，文本框将用较大的文本进行填充。When you click one button the text boxes are filled with a smaller text, and when you click the other button the text boxes are filled with larger text. 将 设置为 `true` 的文本框将高度放大以容纳更大的文本。The text box that has set to `true` expands in height to accommodate the larger text. 不会更改宽度。The width does not change. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性更改文本控件的背景色，以将其与窗体的配色方案混合。You can use the property to change the background color of the text control to blend into the color scheme of your forms. 若要更改控件中的文本的颜色，请使用 属性。To change the color of the text within the control, use the property. 设置文本控件的 属性时，请确保所选颜色不会导致控件文本消失。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果 和 属性都设置为 `Color.Black`，则 textbox 控件中的文本将不可见。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 如果 的 属性设置为 `true`，则此属性可能会超过替代。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了默认的三维控件外，还可以使用 属性创建无边框和平面样式控件。You can use the property to create borderless and flat style controls, in addition to the default three-dimensional control. > [!NOTE] > 派生类 不支持 `BorderStyle.FixedSingle` 样式。The derived class, , does not support the `BorderStyle.FixedSingle` style. 此样式将导致 改为使用 `BorderStyle.Fixed3D` 样式。This style will cause the to use the `BorderStyle.Fixed3D` style instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 派生类来创建一个文本框，该文本框可以使用具有一条边框的20点 Arial 来正确显示文本。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a text box that can properly display text using 20-point Arial with a single border. 此示例使用 属性在字体和 分配给控件后确定控件的适当高度。This example uses the property to determine the appropriate height of the control after the font and have been assigned to the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法返回 `true`，则可以调用 方法来撤消文本框中的上一个操作。If this method returns `true`, you can call the method to undo the last operation in a text box. 可以在 的 事件中使用此方法，或在管理 上按钮状态的代码中使用此方法，以启用或禁用在文本框控件中撤消上一操作的功能。You can use this method in the event of a , or in code that manages the state of buttons on a to enable or disable the ability to undo the previous operation in a text box control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它为执行剪切、复制、粘贴和撤消操作的 对象提供 事件处理程序。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 此示例需要创建一个名为 `textBox1` 控件。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法清除控件的内容，而不是将 属性分配为空字符串。You can use this method to clear the contents of the control instead of assigning the property an empty string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 为 事件创建事件处理程序。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序中的代码将数据限制为数字。The code within the event handler restricts data to numbers. 在控件中输入文本后，代码会确定输入的文本是否为数字。After text has been entered in the control, the code determines if the text entered is a number. 如果文本不是数字，则代码将清除控件中的文本，并显示一个 以提醒用户仅接受数字。If the text is not a number, the code clears the text from the control and a is displayed to alert the user that only numbers are accepted. 该示例要求名为 `flag` 的 `Boolean` 变量和一个名为 `textBox1` 的 控件在此方法的外部定义。The example requires that a `Boolean` variable named `flag` and a control called `textBox1` are defined outside of this method. 此示例演示如何使用标志变量来避免 事件中出现级联事件。This example demonstrates how to use a flag variable to avoid a cascading event in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性更改控件中的文本颜色，以匹配窗体上的其他控件的文本。You can use the property to change the color of the text within the control to match the text of other controls on your form. 您还可以使用此属性突出显示包含无效值的特定文本框。You can also use this property to highlight a specific text box that contains an invalid value. 若要更改控件的背景色，请使用 属性。To change the background color of the control, use the property. 设置文本控件的 属性时，请确保所选颜色不会导致控件文本消失。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果 和 属性都设置为 `Color.Black`，则 textbox 控件中的文本将不可见。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 如果 的 属性设置为 `true`，则此属性可能会超过替代。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `pt` 参数中指定的位置位于控件的工作区之外，则返回最接近 `pt` 中指定的点的字符串的第一个字符。If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned. 您可以使用此方法来确定哪些字符位于控件中的特定点附近。You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control. 然后，可以使用此值对该位置的文本执行操作。You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `pt` 参数中的指定位置位于控件的工作区右侧，则返回最接近 `pt` 中指定的点的字符串的最后一个字符。If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与 `pt` 参数中指定位置最接近的字符索引。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是控件中的文本的从零开始的索引，其中包括空格。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用此方法，通过将鼠标坐标传递到此方法来确定用户在文本中的位置。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 如果要在用户将鼠标指针悬停在控件文本中的单词上时执行任务，这会很有用。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果指定的位置不在控件的客户端矩形内，或超出了控件中的最后一个字符，则返回值为最后一个字符的索引。If the specified location is not within the client rectangle of the control, or is beyond the last character in the control, the return value is the index of the last character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本框中的行号从零开始。Line numbering in the text box starts at zero. 如果 `lineNumber` 参数大于文本框中的最后一行，则 返回-1。If the `lineNumber` parameter is greater than the last line in the text box, returns -1. 返回物理行的第一个字符索引。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 物理行是显示的行，而不是所分配的行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 由于换行，显示的行数可以大于分配的行数。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 例如，如果将两个长行分配给 控件并将 和 设置为 `true`，则两个长时间分配的行将导致四个物理（或显示的行）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

span.span: The value of the parameter is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您能够根据在方法的 `index` 参数中指定的字符索引来确定行号。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的第一行文本返回值零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回索引字符位于控件中的物理行号。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果控件中第一个逻辑文本行的一部分包装到下一行，则在指定字符索引处的字符已包装到第二个物理行时， 方法返回1。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果 设置为 `false`，则行的任何部分都不会换到下一步，并且对于指定的字符索引，该方法将返回0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用此方法来确定特定字符索引所在的行。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用 方法搜索文本后，可以获取搜索结果所在位置的字符索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以使用 方法返回的字符索引来调用此方法，以确定找到该单词的行。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `index` 参数中指定的字符索引超出了控件内包含的可用行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的每个元素都将成为文本框控件中的一行文本。Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control. 如果文本框控件的 属性设置为 `true` 并且文本中出现换行符，则换行符后面的文本将添加到数组中的新元素并显示在单独的行上。If the property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，行集合是 中的行的只读副本。By default, the collection of lines is a read-only copy of the lines in the . 若要获取可写的行集合，请使用类似于下面的代码： `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`To get a writable collection of lines, use code similar to the following: `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 从多行文本框控件提取所有文本字符串，并使用 方法显示它们。The following code example uses , a derived class, to extract all strings of text from a multiline text box control and displays them using the method. 此示例要求已创建 控件，并将其命名为 `textBox1`，并且已使用文本行进行填充。This example requires that a control has been created, named `textBox1`, and that it has been filled with lines of text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来限制控件中为邮政编码和电话号码等值输入的文本长度，或限制在数据库中输入数据时输入的文本长度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以将在控件中输入的文本限制为数据库中对应字段的最大长度。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在代码中，你可以将 属性的值设置为长度大于 属性指定的值的值。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 此属性仅影响运行时输入到控件中的文本。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 来创建用于接受密码的文本框。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a text box that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用 属性将键入的所有字符更改为大写，并使用 属性将密码长度限制为8个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to uppercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用 属性使密码在 控件中居中。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来确定用户是否修改了文本框控件的内容。You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the text box control. 你还可以在代码中设置此属性，以指示应用程序对文本框控件进行了更改。You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the text box control by the application. 此属性可由验证和数据保存方法用来确定是否已在文本框控件中进行了更改，以便可以验证或保存更改的内容。This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a text box control so the changed contents can be validated or saved. 如果以编程方式更改 属性，则 属性将恢复为 `false`。If you change the property programmatically, the property reverts to `false`. 这不会引发 事件。This does not raise the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 派生类的 事件，以确定在控件填充数据后， 控件的内容是否发生了更改。The following code example uses the event for a , a derived class, to determine if the contents of the control have changed since the control was filled with data. 该示例使用字符串来存储控件的原始内容，并将其与 的内容进行比较，以确定内容是否已更改。The example uses a string to store the original contents of the control and compares it against the contents of the to determine if the contents have changed. 如果内容已更改，则 属性设置为 `true`。If the contents have changed, the property is set to `true`. 否则，会将其重置为 `false`。Otherwise, it is reset to `false`. 此示例要求已创建了一个名为 `textBox1` 的 控件，并且已创建一个名为 `originalText` 的 `String` 变量来存储 控件的原始文本。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created and that a `String` variable named `originalText` has been created to store the original text for the control. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示它是否为多行文本框控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.

value.span: 如果该控件是多行文本框控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is a multiline text box control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用多行文本框可以在控件中显示多行文本。A multiline text box allows you to display more than one line of text in the control. 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则在多行文本框中输入的文本将被包装到控件中的下一行。If the property is set to `true`, text entered into the multiline text box is wrapped to the next line in the control. 如果将 属性设置为 `false`，则在多行文本框控件中输入的文本将显示在同一行上，直到输入换行符。If the property is set to `false`, text entered into the multiline text box control will be displayed on the same line until a newline character is entered. 可以将以下字符用作换行符：The following can be used as newline characters: - - ControlChars.CrLfControlChars.CrLf - vbCrLf （仅 Visual Basic）vbCrLf (Visual Basic only) 您可以使用 "" 属性向文本框添加滚动条，以显示水平和/或垂直滚动条。You can add scroll bars to a text box using the property to display horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars. 这允许用户滚动浏览超出控件尺寸的文本。This allows the user to scroll through the text that extends beyond the dimensions of the control. > [!NOTE] > 由于 属性的默认值为 `false`，因此 的默认大小将与字体大小一致，即使调整了 大小也是如此。Because the default value of the property is `false`, the default size of a will be in accordance with the font size even if you resize the . 若要为 获取一致大小，请将其 属性设置为 "`true`"。To get a consistent size for your , set its property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在日语操作系统上，如果 属性设置为 `true`，则设置 属性将显示密码的文本，从而危及系统安全。On Japanese operating systems, if the property is set to `true`, setting the property will display the text of the password, thus compromising system security. 因此，在日语操作系统上，如果设置 属性，请将 属性设置为 `false`。Therefore, on Japanese operating systems, set the property to `false` if you set the property. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，此属性设置为所有派生类 `false`， 控件除外。This property is set to `false` by default for all derived classes, with the exception of the control. 对于 控件， 属性会影响控件是否将自动调整大小，如下所示：For a control, the property affects whether or not the control will automatically resize, as follows: - 如果 设置为 `true` 并且 设置为 `true`， 不会自动调整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `true`, will not automatically resize. - 如果 设置为 `true` 并且 设置为 `false`， 将自动调整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `false`, will automatically resize. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 创建具有垂直滚动条的多行 控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用 、和 属性，使多行文本框控件对于创建文本文档很有用。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 将控件内容滚动到当前插入符号位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可让你滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号位于控件的可见区域内。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果插入符号位于控件的可见区域下方，则 方法将滚动控件的内容，直到在控件底部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果插入符号位于控件的可见区域之上，则此方法将滚动控件的内容，直到在控件顶部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 您可以在多行文本框中使用此方法，以确保当前文本输入点位于控件的可见区域内。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件没有焦点，或插入符号已定位在控件的可视区域中，则此方法不起作用。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 枚举和 方法，以确保按下 ENTER 键后，在屏幕上始终显示插入点表示的文本插入点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration and the method to ensure that the text insertion point, represented by the caret, is always visible on the screen after the ENTER key has been pressed. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含名为 `TextBox1` 的 控件的窗体中，并将一个名为 `RichTextBox1` 控件。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `TextBox1` and a control called `RichTextBox1`. 此示例要求事件处理方法已与 事件关联。This example requires that the event-handling method has been associated with the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBaseScrolling/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将起始位置设置为控件文本中的第一个字符，请将 `start` 参数设置为0。If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0. 您可以使用此方法来选择文本的子字符串，例如搜索控件的文本和替换信息。You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过将 `start` 参数设置为文本框中您希望插入符号移动到的位置，并将 `length` 参数设置为零（0）值，以编程方式在文本框中移动插入符号。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0). 文本框必须具有焦点，才能移动插入符号。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved. > [!NOTE] > 如果在没有任何参数的情况下调用此方法，将使用替代方法。If this method is called without any parameters, an alternative method is used. 此替代方法从 类继承而来。This alternative method inherits from the class. 调用时，它会将输入焦点设置到控件，并选择控件的内容。When called, it sets the input focus to the control and selects the contents of the control. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 在控件的内容中搜索单词 "fox" 的实例。The following code example uses , a derived class, to search the contents of the control for the instance of the word "fox". 如果找到，则代码使用 方法选择控件中的单词。If found, the code selects the word in the control using the method. 此示例要求已创建了一个名为 `textBox1` 的 ，其 属性包含一个 "快速棕色 fox 跨延迟 dog 跳转" 这一句。This example requires that a named `textBox1` has been created and its property contains the sentence "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog." remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在控件中未选择任何文本，此属性将指示新文本的插入点或插入符号。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point, or caret, for new text. 如果将此属性设置为超出控件中文本长度的位置，则所选内容的起始位置将被置于最后一个字符之后。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 在文本框控件中选择文本时，更改此属性可能会降低 属性的值。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果控件中由 属性指示的位置之后的剩余文本小于 属性的值， 属性的值将自动减少。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 属性的值永远不会导致 属性增加。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. 您可以通过设置 "" 和 "" 属性，以编程方式在文本框中移动选择。You can programmatically move the selection within the text box by setting the and the properties. 您可以通过在文本框中将 设置为要在其中移动插入符号的位置以编程方式移动插入符号，并将 属性设置为零（0）值。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 若要移动所选内容或插入符号， 必须具有焦点。The must have focus in order for the selection or the caret to be moved. 您可以设置 的 的 属性，方法是首先向其授予 。You can set the property of a that is by giving it the first. ## Examples **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的代码示例使用派生类 。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它为执行剪切、复制、粘贴和撤消操作的 对象提供 事件处理程序。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 此示例需要创建一个名为 `textBox1` 控件。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created.
